Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to the documentation and preservation of Black history in New York state by the state university of New York
Summary: Establishes the New York state Black history preservation commission to ensure the documentation and preservation of Black history in New York state within the state university of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the documentation and preservation of Black history in New York state by the state university of New York
